name: Zombie Farm Viewer
description:
A Zombie Farm Viewer Prototype

This is not a 1:1 replica of the original zombie farm mobile game (yet). I am actively working on replicating the original game in the Godot engine. I have even decompiled the original games 'APK' so you can view the source code and all of the graphics used. 

This project is mainly for me. its main purpose is to make me nostalgic for the original game. 

Note: The web browser version is not as good as the desktop version. See the "Install Instructions" section for more info

Original Zombie Farm Game Decompiled: https://github.com/jeb495/Zombie-Farm-Decompiled
